author: Sarah Motter
title: Caught on Camera: Police seek porch pirate seen stealing from Brookside home
text:
KANSAS CITY, Mo. (KCTV) - Police are searching for another porch pirate caught on camera stealing packages and clothes from a Brookside home.
The Kansas City, Missouri, Police Department has announced that investigators are now seeking another porch pirate who hit a home in the Brookside area. The crime was once again caught on surveillance tape.
Law enforcement officials noted that on Aug. 6, a man in sunglasses could be seen exiting a silver SUV in the driveway of a Brookside home. He walked up the front walkway and took multiple hangars of clothing wrapped in plastic bags as well as a package.
Investigators indicated that the man reentered the vehicle and sped away. Anyone with information about the porch pirateâ€™s identity or with more information about the incident should report it to the TIPS Hotline at 816-474-TIPS.
KCPD warned that this type of crime is a felony. As of Thursday, Aug. 8, no further information has been released.
